translation.start.narration: Welcome to Life! In this game you will be given choices to make in your new virtual life! Would you like to play?
translation.opener.narration: You can pick between these places to study; Trade School, Public College, Private College, or Party School. Which would you like?
translation.party.narration: The party school it is. There are many frats and sororities that you can become a part of. This type of college is great for having fun. Even though it is considered a party school you still need to figure out what field you would like to study in.
translation.private.narration: You have chosen a private college!
translation.public.narration: You have chosen a public college!
translation.choosemajor.narration: Would you like to study science, or art?
translation.sciences.narration: You chose to study the sciences.
translation.arts.narration: You chose to study in the field of art.
translation.collegelife.narration: Your first two years you work on getting all your general education done with. During your schooling you decided how you wanted to spend your time. You could go out and party, focus on your studies, or try to do both. How would you want to spend your college time?
translation.both_life.narration: You chose to try and do both!
translation.study_life.narration: You chose to study! You have made the choice that studying and getting good grades is worth your time, because of the money you are spending.
translation.party_life.narration: You chose to party! Your time spent while at college is going out and partying a lot. You spend too much time partying to where it affects your education and you donâ€™t learn much.
translation.workstudy.narration: Want to work while at college?
translation.workstudy_yes.narration: You chose to work at college. The rest of your time not learning at school you spend working. This allows you to save up some money to pay off your Schooling. You get out of college with great experience and are ready to get out there in the real world.
translation.workstudy_no.narration: You know having a job would help you make some extra cash to pay for things and college. However, you think that focusing on your studies is more important right now. You chose not to work at college
translation.graduatedcollege.narration: Congrats! you made your way through college.
translation.wheretolive.narration: where do you want to live for now until you are able to make more money and buy a house for yourself?
translation.parents_house.narration: You are living in your parents basement
translation.apartment.narration: You are living in your own apartment. independance!
translation.choosejob.narration: Time to choose a job. What job do you want?
translation.sciencejobs.narration: You chose to get a degree in science so you can choose the following jobs: Programmer, Doctor, Forensic scientist
translation.artjobs.narration: You chose to get a degree in the arts so you can choose the following jobs: teacher, writer, or a designer?
translation.tradejobs.narration: You chose to get a degree in a trade so you can choose the following jobs: constructor, Auto mechanic, electrician
translation.programmer.narration: You become a programmer. You enjoyed the problem sovling and writing program that do things for you.
translation.doctor.narration: You chose to become a doctor. This was fit for you because of how much you want to save peoples lives.
translation.forensic_scientist.narration: Wanting to help find criminals you became a forensic scientist. using you abilities to analyze evidence to use in determining the innocence or guild of a suspect.
translation.teacher.narration: Being with kids and helping them learn is a passion of yours. You took your passion and are now a teacher.
translation.writer.narration: Writing your own stories to tell a compelling peice is amazing. You took your skills and used them to become a writer.
translation.designer.narration: You decided on being a designer. Making creative work and displaying it for people to see.
translation.construction.narration: You are a constructor now. using math and physics to create wonderful buildings.
translation.auto_mechanic.narration: Fixing cars and getting old ones to work again is something fantastic. You chose to become an auto mechanic
translation.electrician.narration: Running wire through a house and getting power to everything is phenomenal. You became a electrician
translation.chooseresidents.narration: You have to choose where you would like to live at. Somewhere in the country, city, or suburbs?
translation.country.narration: You love the wide-open outdoors with no traffic, few neighbors, and planty of room for activiies. The country is where you want to live.
translation.city.narration: You enjoy the hustle and bustle of the City. There are many things to do and go in the city, that is why you wanted to live there
translation.suburb.narration: after looking at all the different places to live you decided being in a safe and cozy suburb would be great for you.
translation.marriage.narration: Having finally got your job and living on your own, you wonder to yourself if you want to get a spouse to spend your time with. Do you want to get married or stay single
translation.married.narration: Congratulations! You are getting married to the love of your life. Is the Wedding going to be a big one or small?
translation.single.narration: You figured that getting married would be a waste of your time and cause you pain and suffering. There is a reason why so many people get divorced. You made it through your life. making it through college and having a sucessful job. You live your retirement alone, but it does not feel that way living in the where you are. Congratulations, on completing your Journey! Come back soon and play again.
translation.big.narration: You want to have a big wedding with lots of people, food, and decorations. The wedding went great. You invited all your family and friends to celebrate the occasion.
translation.small.narration: You only wanted to have a few people at your wedding and not many decorations to keep the cost down.
translation.married_life.narration: Now that you have been married for some time and life is going well are kids something you would like to have?
translation.kids1.narration: You and yoru partner had a kid! Congrats!
translation.kids2.narration: You and your partner had twins! Twice as much fun!
translation.kids3.narration: What luck! You and your partner had triplets! A tripple threat!
translation.retire_choice.narration: You lived a great life having kids and watching them grow up. You have been at your job for 20 years would you like to retire?
translation.retire.narration: After a great long time at your job, living with your family and seeing them grow up. You decided to reitre from work and enjoy the rest of life together with your spouse. Thank you for playing life, come back again soon.
translation.dontretire.narration: You enjoy your job to much and don't know if you would ever stop working in life. You continue the rest of your life working with fewer hours and spending the evening with your family. Congratualtions on making through life. Play again and choose different outcomes.
translation.scenario2.narration: You have now moved into your new place but you soon discover that your new living space needs repairs. Thats gonna hurt the wallet!
translation.scenario1.narration: You were at a party and fell off a roof and broke your back! You had to be transported by ambulance to the hospital
translation.scenario3.narration: Your hard work has finally paid off! Your boss has decided to give you a raise after all the time and effort you have put in!
translation.scenario4.narration: Uh Oh! Looks like your kids have outgrown their current bedset in their room and they need a new one!
